property.name: tags
property.description-key: The Field the control is bound to (ex. my_tags)

property.name: tagsEntity
property.description-key: The name of the Tag entity (ex. my_tag)

property.name: tagsEntityDisplayNameField
property.description-key: The Tag field to display in the control (ex. my_name)

property.name: tagsEntityCategoryField
property.description-key: The field of the tag entity that references the category (ex. my_category)

property.name: connectionRoleName
property.description-key: The name of the Role used for tags connection (ex. Tags Connection). NOTE: Connections must be enabled on entities and Role created.

property.name: categoryEntity
property.description-key: The name of the Category entity (ex. my_tagcategory)

property.name: categories
property.description-key: The Categories to filter (comma-delimited) (ex. Default, Category 1,Category 2).
